OOC: 
Sorry if I seem rather confused... but are these Autobot/Maximal "jet=
s" or Decepticon/Predicon "jets"? Lots was focused on posting for me (which=
 I do not fancy) and left me very confused as to what Maxima was suppose to=
 be finding which she, in my opinon, wasn't there yet but was going to hold=
 off arriving completely, remaining at the edge of, near the place as Hydra=
s wanted so to speak. Observing from a distance. That was one thought I had=
. 
So... Ummm... shall see what next to do I suppose. I'll post in a day or=
 two as I read this a little more and try to understand plus get my bearing=
s of what next to post. 


~Lady B
